form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure the parameters for your k6 load test, Lighthouse audit, and AI SEO analysis.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the endpoint or page you want to test.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select one or more test suites to run against the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic to analyze performance under load.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Audit for performance, accessibility, and SEO.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Use AI to analyze on-page SEO factors.
form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request details for the load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Choose a preset or define a custom load profile for the k6 test.
form.customProfileDescription: Define a fixed number of VUs and duration, or a stages-based ramping profile.
form.stagesDescription: Define the ramp-up and ramp-down stages.

error.atLeastOne: At least one test suite must be selected.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Your test history and recent URLs have been cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your tests are now running. You can monitor the progress in real-time.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Existing History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: Would you like to clear your entire existing test history and recent URLs list before starting this new test?

descriptions.custom: Define your own VUs and stages.

running.title: Test in Progress...
running.description: Please wait while your tests are completed. This may take a few minutes.

summary.title: Test Complete
summary.description: The test run for {{url}} has finished. See the summary below.
summary.noK6Data: No k6 load test data available.

history.title: Test History
history.description: View, re-load, or re-run past test runs.
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a test to begin your history.

clearAllDialog.title: Clear All History?
clearAllDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your saved test runs and recent URLs.

deleteDialog.title: Delete This Test Run?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this test run from your history.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been successfully downloaded as a JSON file.
toast.exportFailDescription: Could not export the history. Please try again.
toast.importSuccessDescription: The test history has been successfully imported from the file.
toast.importFailDescription: Could not read or process the history file.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: Your entire test history has been successfully deleted.

about.title: About K6 Commander
about.description: A local-first, authorized load-testing and API development platform that allows you to configure, run, and analyze k6 load tests, Lighthouse audits, SEO checks, as well as test APIs with a full-featured client.
about.localFirstDescription: Your data is yours. All test configurations and results are stored exclusively in your browser's LocalStorage.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: Save time by managing essential web performance and quality tests from a single, intuitive interface.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Analyze your application's performance under load.
about.k6HowItWorks: The app generates a k6 test script based on your input and runs it in a Docker container.
about.k6HowItWorks2: Metrics are sent to a local InfluxDB instance and visualized in a live Grafana dashboard.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: Runs Google Lighthouse via `npx` in a background process.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: The resulting JSON and HTML report is saved and displayed in a summary view.
about.seoHowItWorks: The HTML content of your URL is fetched and sent to the Google AI API.
about.seoHowItWorks2: A Genkit flow analyzes the HTML for key SEO factors and returns actionable advice.
about.apiTesterFeatureDescription: A full-featured client for testing and debugging APIs.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks: Makes direct Fetch requests from the browser to test any API.
about.apiTesterHowItWorks2: Maintains a local history of requests and collections, and allows cURL import/export.
about.stackDescription: This project is powered by a combination of modern and powerful technologies:
about.involvedDescription: K6 Commander is open source! We welcome contributions, bug reports, and feature requests.

apiTester.newCollectionDescription: Create a new collection to organize your API requests.

deleteCollectionDialog.title: Delete Collection?
deleteCollectionDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the '{{name}}' collection and all requests within it? This action cannot be undone.

deleteRequestDialog.title: Delete Request?
deleteRequestDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this request from your history?

apiTester.noRequestsDescription: Send a request to see it here.
apiTester.noResponseYetDesc: Send a request to see a response.

toast.cannotDeleteDefault: The default collection cannot be deleted.
toast.curlImportErrorDescription: Please enter a valid cURL command.
toast.curlImportSuccessDescription: Request was imported from the cURL command.
toast.apiCurlCopiedDescription: API call has been copied to your clipboard.

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Quickly navigate to any part of the application.
